QuestData.Title: A Saur Point
QuestData.Description:
That saurolisk has been a folktale in these hills for years. "Sourtooth, you can smell his breath from miles away".
Today that folktale attacked my family, almost killed my father and sister. It's time for it to die.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: His rotten breath can be smelled miles away.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'm not leaving till Sourtooth is dead!
QuestData.RewardText: No more smelling it's breath in the wind.
